CMH.JO.summary: Combined Motor Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the motor retail and car hire businesses in South Africa. It offers new and used vehicles, parts, and related service; and life, disability, retrenchment, and vehicle warranty insurance products, as well as vehicle financing solutions. The company also operates a fleet of approximately 7,000 vehicles through First Car Rental. In addition, it is involved in the distribution and franchising business. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Umhlanga, South Africa.
